mapper.select: SELECT TEC.EMP_CERT_ID, TEC.CERT_REG_DATE, TEC.ISSUE_STATUS FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TE JOIN TBL_EMP_CERT TEC ON TE.EMP_ID = TEC.EMP_ID WHERE TE.EMP_ID = #{empId};
SELECT TEC.EXPER_CERT_ID, TEC.CERT_REG_DATE, TEC.ISSUE_STATUS FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TE JOIN TBL_EXPERIENCE_CERT TEC ON TE.EMP_ID = TEC.EMP_ID WHERE TE.EMP_ID = #{empId};
SELECT TRC.RETIRE_CERT_ID, TRC.CERT_REG_DATE, TRC.ISSUE_STATUS FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TE JOIN TBL_RETIRE_CERT TRC ON TE.EMP_ID = TRC.EMP_ID WHERE TE.EMP_ID = #{empId};
select cert_file_name from TBL_EMP_CERT where emp_cert_id = #{certId};
select cert_file_name from TBL_EXPERIENCE_CERT where exper_cert_id = #{certId};
select cert_file_name from TBL_RETIRE_CERT where retire_cert_id = #{certId};
mapper.update: update TBL_EMP_CERT set issue_status = 1 where emp_cert_id = #{certId};
update TBL_EXPER_CERT set issue_status = 1 where exper_cert_id = #{certId};
update TBL_RETIRE_CERT set issue_status = 1 where retire_cert_id = #{certId};
